scripts.stage: rm -r build/ && tsc && zip -r nysos-backend${BACKVER}.zip package.json build/ && gsutil cp nysos-backend${BACKVER}.zip gs://nysos/nysos-backend${BACKVER}.zip  && gcloud functions deploy nysos-backend$BACKVER --trigger-http --runtime nodejs10 --source=gs://nysos/nysos-backend${BACKVER}.zip --allow-unauthenticated --region=europe-west1
